text:
The sample file uses charset UTF-8. This file contains some chars 'CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER I'. Replace filter shouldn't replace this letter but replace with nod UTF-8 character.

Script copies cyrillic.UTF-8.original.xml to cyrillic.UTF-8.copy-replace.xml (use replace task) and cyryllic.UTF-8.copy-filter.xml (use copy task with filterset).

Test platform: Windows, system encoding windows-1251.

========================== build.xml for test =============================
<project name="copyBug.cyrillic" default="copyBug-test" basedir=".">

	<property name="basename" value="cyrillic.UTF-8"/>
	<property name="original" value="${basename}.original.xml"/>
	<property name="copy.filter" value="${basename}.copy-filter.xml"/>
	<property name="copy.replace" value="${basename}.copy-replace.xml"/>

	<target name="copyBug-test">
		<copy file="${original}" overwrite="true" tofile="${copy.replace}"/>
		<replace file="${copy.replace}">
			<replacefilter token="@someTextForReplacement@" value="new text"/>
		</replace>
		<copy file="${original}" overwrite="true" tofile="${copy.filter}">
			<filterset>
				<filter token="someTextForReplacement" value="new text too"/>
			</filterset>
		</copy>
	</target>

</project>
